policies.title: Data backup and storage policy

policies.title: Termination Procedures Policy s
policies.description: Human Resources (HR) or the responsible supervisor must provide advance notice to the Compliance Officer and IT Department (or applicable individual) when a workforce member’s employment or engagement is ending, or when their role changes such that access to PHI/ePHI is no longer required.
